subject: verbose TextRunner?
msgSnippet: We have a hanging unit test suite -- is there a TextRunner that will output the name of each test class (and possibly test method) as it s being run so we can
messageBody:
We have a hanging unit test suite -- is there a TextRunner that will
output the name of each test class (and possibly test method) as it's
being run so we can find where in the suite it's hanging?

--
Chris
http://clabs.org
